vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.16;
son of: Gad (H1410);
brother of: Ziphion (H6837), Haggi (H2291), Ezbon (H0675), Eri (H6179), Arod (H0720) and Areli (H0692)
Also named: shu.ni (שׁוּנִי "Shunite" H7765)
§ Shuni = "fortunate"
son of Gad and progenitor of the family of Shunites
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Gad; (b)   descendiente de Suní, hijo de Gad
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
書尼 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "幸運的"
迦得的兒子, 書尼族的始祖 #創 46:16; 民 26:15|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
书尼 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "幸运的"
迦得的儿子, 书尼族的始祖 #创 46:16; 民 26:15|
